name: Jet Copter X
description:
PlayStation Store Description (from Ad Blurbs)

Jet CopterX is a helicopter action game that provides the realest thrill of controlling a helicopter. Choose from five types of helicopter and save lives by flying the helicopter among narrow valleys and over stiff cliffs. Jump into the helicopter and get ready for the challenging missions today!

This content is compatible with PlayStation®3 and PSP® (PlayStation®Portable).

One time fee for use or downloads on up to 2 console systems and 2 portable systems that are compatible with the content and associated with the purchasing account.
